title: I don't get it...
body: I didn't message or 'issue' Riot...(ignore the ARAM loss, we had an AFK)

replies.body: i got this pre-game and ended up crashing mid game
Strange, Mind posting your Network logs. Ill take a look at see if i can help.
I get this at the postgame if I DC for like 5 seconds in game and don't need to relaunch.
What seems to be the issue?, This error is most common when the PVP.net client loses connection with the Riot Games server.
wow you lost in aram, haha scrub
